context: The word 'kuusi' has two main meanings in Finnish. It can refer to the number six, and it also means spruce tree (specifically Norway spruce). The provided dictionary definitions detail its use as a numeral with various inflections, and as a noun referring to the tree species *Picea abies*. As a numeral, it declines based on case and number. As a noun, it also has different forms depending on the context.
